overview: Jonathan is an Emmy award-winning software engineer and the author of the Oâ€™Reilly book â€œProgramming Social Applicationsâ€. He specializes in open source initiatives around the implementation of social engagement services. He also works with and promotes emerging technologies to aid in the adoption and utilization of new social development techniques, such as his work on the OpenSocial foundation board.
